scripts.protractor-install: if [ -f '.travis.yml' ]; then test/bin/protractor/install.sh; else bin/protractor/install.sh; fi
scripts.protractor-prepare: if [ -f '.travis.yml' ]; then test/bin/protractor/prepare.sh; else bin/protractor/prepare.sh; fi
scripts.install: if [ -f '.travis.yml' ]; then test/bin/install.sh; else bin/install.sh; fi
scripts.pretest: if [ -f '.travis.yml' ]; then test/bin/pretest.sh; else bin/pretest.sh; fi
scripts.test: if [ -f '.travis.yml' ]; then test/bin/test.sh; else bin/test.sh; fi
scripts.posttest: if [ -f '.travis.yml' ]; then test/bin/posttest.sh; else bin/posttest.sh; fi
scripts.coverage: if [ -f '.travis.yml' ]; then test/bin/coverage.sh; else bin/coverage.sh; fi
scripts.build: npm run build:styles && npm run build:modules
